name: Hexanedioic acid, polymer with 1,3-benzenedimethanamine
FoodContactSubstance: Hexanedioic acid, polymer with 1,3-benzenedimethanamine (CAS Reg. No. 25718-70-1), meeting the specifications in 21 CFR 177.1500(b) item 10.2, when tested by the method given in 21 CFR 177.1500(c). The FCS is also known as Nylon MXD-6.
manufacturer: FCS: Mitsubishi Gas Chemical Company, Inc., Tokyo, Japan; Polymers modified with the FCS: Gruppo Mossi & Ghisolfi
